title: Okay Google not responding to "take a screenshot"
content: Did Google remove the option to take a screenshot from Google Assistant? When I first purchased my Pixel last year, I could "Okay Google... Take a screenshot" and it worked without issue. Now when I tell it to take a screenshot, I get a pop up telling me to turn on the Use screenshot toggle in the Assist & voice input settings. I've confirmed this is on, restarted assistant, rebooted, etc... I'm still getting this message.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
